casebody.data:
BLACKSTONE CONSULTING, INC., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant-Appellee. No. 05-5128. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. March 8, 2006.

Before MICHEL, Chief Judge, LINN and PROST, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM:

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
